TopicTitle: Unable to dock and undock with the SM-25

Articles.Content:
KSP: 1.6.0 MAC 

Problem: When the side panels of the SM-25(the Apollo-like service module) are decoupled, docking become impossible - or, if the craft is already docked, undocking become impossible. In some cases, one of the vessels will be thrown away at high speed.

Mods installed:

Attitude Adjuster 1.0
Vessel Mover 1.7.3
Final Frontier 1.5.3
HullCam VDS continued 0.1.10.2
Docking Alignement Indicator: 6.8.2
ScanSat 18.10
TAC life support 0.13.11
TAC fuel balancer 2.20.0
Trajectories 2.2.1
VAB orienter 1.1
Vessel categorizer 1.1
Community category kit 4.0.0
Community ressource pack 1.0
Clicktrought blocker 0.1.6
Toolbar control 0.1.6
MechJeb 2.8.0
MakingHistory

Reproduction steps:

Build a simple craft with a docking port and the SM-25 and dock with another craft. 

Log: link

Have you tried asking IRC?

 

(sorry GP, couldn't resist)
Ok. I solved the problem by updating to 1.6.1
